resources.string: Do you have a keen eye and ear for the stories of people and brands? Are you creative with text and image and fascinated by the world of media? Then the Communication course is for you!

Our Communication course trains you in four years to what we - proudly - call a smart connector. A professional who ensures smart connections. With the use of social tools, storytelling, big data and co-creation, for example. You develop creative concepts such as media campaigns, events and story platforms. Based on good research, theory and strategy and of course your own surprising ideas.
The Communication course teaches you to touch, connect and move people as a smart connector. Curious? Stories from the training can be found on our platform www.smartconnecting.nl.
We train you to be a software engineer. You get started with the development of software for various applications. You are able to analyze design and implement complex IT systems

Software can be found all around us. You are the specialist in creating large and complex software information systems that work quickly, efficiently and securely. You can think of developing a functional app, but also analyzing large amounts of data from social media. When developing these systems you come into contact with languages. In the first year you learn how to program in Python and Java / C #. From the second year on, you choose which language you want to use. In addition to programming and developing various applications, you also learn to collaborate.
Are you interested in new technological developments, curious, a little quirky and a go-getter, then the Computer Science course is for you!

Inside CMI we have the studies Communication(CO),Communication and Multimedia Design (CMD), Creative Media and Game Technologies (CMGT, Technical Informatica (TI) and Informatica (INF). The \'Stadslab\' is also established in the building.
We train you to be a software engineer. You get started with the development of software for various applications. You are able to analyze design and implement complex IT systems

Software can be found all around us. You are the specialist in creating complex software systems that work quickly, efficiently and securely. You can think of developing a app, but also analyzing large amounts of data. When developing these systems you come into contact with different languages. In the first year you learn how to program in Python and advanced programming languages ​​such as Java / C #. From the second year on, you choose which programming language you want to use. In addition to programming and developing various applications, you also learn to collaborate.
Are you interested in new technological developments, curious, a little quirky and a go-getter, then the Computer Science course is for you!
Communication and Multimedia Design Open Day
Creative Media and Game Technologies Open Day

Wijnhaven 107 lays in the center of Rotterdam. If approaching from the south, drive over the Erasmusbrug. When approaching from the north, drive over the Coolsingel in the direction of the Kubuswoningen, then take a right turn at the Posthornstraat, and take the second right turn to Wijnhaven 107.

From Rotterdam Central Station, take metroline D too \'De Akkers\' or take metroline E too \'Slinge\'. Exit the metro at station Beurs, walk toward Maritime museum. You should see the building when you\'re standing on \'Plein 1940\'
We train you to be a software engineer. You get started with the development of software for various applications. You are able to analyze design and implement complex IT systems

As a technical computer scientist you work on modern IT systems in which hardware and software are integrated. Thanks to programming and hardware knowledge, you can operate at the intersection thereof.
Do you have a keen eye and ear for the stories op people and brands? Are you creative with text and image and facinated by the world of media? Then the communication course is for you!
